channel.title: Golang on Tacy - Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on Tacy - Notes

item.title: golang notes
item.description: 配置 pacman -S go export GOPATH=~/workspace/go/go-tools/ go get github.com/mailgun/godebug go get github.com/nsf/gocode go get github.com/rogpeppe/godef go get github.com/tools/godep go get golang.org/x/tools/cmd/goimports go get golang.org/x/tools/cmd/oracle export PATH=$PATH:~/workspace/go/go-tools/bin 不建议在bash_profile里面设置GOPATH，Go的依赖问题容易导致冲突，建议
